pages.text: $(li)The Turkey is a large bird that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/maple_forest)Maple Forest$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can bred them giving $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/foul_berry)Foul Berries$(/l) to them.$(br)$(li)It may drops Feathers and Raw Turkey on death.
